trans-unit.source: Represents an items control that hosts contextual tab groups in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroupItemsControl"></xref> class.
Unloads the container for the specified item.
This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroupItemsControl.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> object.

A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
The item to test.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroupItemsControl"></xref> when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
This property is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroupItemsControl.Ribbon*> dependency property.
To be added.
